author: dain
msg: Fixed stop and unload methods on ConfigurationManager
Added results return value to ConfigurationManger lifecycle methods
Added ant style pattern matching to configuration classpath

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-822: Client driver: Pre-fetch data on executeQuery()
This patch makes the network server include query data when it replies
to an OPNQRY command. (Query data is only included when there are no
LOB columns and the protocol is limited block protocol.)

author: mloenko
msg: java.beans.Beans.instantiate(ClassLoader cls, String name) throws ClassNotFoundException if cls == null

author: sullis
msg: eliminated usage of a deprecated method
